feat.title: Accursed Coordination
feat.benefit: You can place your warlock's curse on a creature that is already affected by another character's curse.
In addition, you have combat advantage against any creature affected by more than one warlock's curse.

feat.title: Aerenal Arcanist
feat.benefit: Choose an additional power for each level of utility power you know from an arcane class. Each time you learn a new level of utility powers for an arcane class, choose an additional one of the same level.
After an extended reach, choose which arcane utility power of each level you can use for that day. This feat does not change the number of arcane utility powers you can use each day.
If you use a Spellbook, the additional utility power is in addition to any you gain from that feature.

feat.title: Allegiance to the Daughter
feat.benefit: Whenever you reduce an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points or less with a warlock attack, the enemy's space fills with hellfire until the end of your next turn.
Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the flames takes fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level.

feat.title: Arcane Admixture
feat.benefit: Choose one arcane power that you know, and choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
The chosen power now deals the chosen damage type in addition to its normal damage type and gains that keyword.
Each time you gain a level, you can choose to reassign either the power to which this feat's effect applies or the additional damage type applied (or both).
feat.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose a different power. You can't apply this feat to the same power more than once.

feat.title: Arcane Familiar
feat.benefit: You gain a familiar.
For each Familiar feat you have beyond this one, your familiar gains a +1 bonus to all defenses.

feat.title: Arcane Fire
feat.benefit: When you hit a target with an arcane fire power, that target gains vulnerable 5 cold against the first arcane attack power you use against it before the end of your next turn.
This vulnerability increases to vulnerable 10 cold at 21st level.

feat.title: Arcane Fury
feat.benefit: When you use your furious assault racial power to deal extra damage to the target of an area or close arcane power, you deal the extra damage to all targets you hit with the power, not just one.

feat.title: Arcane Implement Proficiency
feat.benefit: Choose a type of implement that any arcane class is proficient in.
You gain proficiency in that kind of implement. If the implement is also a weapon, you do not gain proficiency in using it as a weapon.

feat.title: Arcane Malice
feat.benefit: Whenever you make an arcane daily attack, choose one creature you hit with that attack.
You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the chosen creature until the end of the encounter.
If you have the Student of the Plague feat, you also gain +1 attack bonus against that creature until the end of the encounter.

feat.title: Arcane Reach
feat.benefit: When using an arcane close attack power, you can choose a square within 2 squares of your space as the origin square. In all other ways, the power is still a close attack.

feat.title: Arcane Repositioning
feat.benefit: On your turn, you can use a free action to expend your fey step to teleport one of your conjurations or a creature you have summoned rather than yourself.
If you do so, select one conjuration or summoned creature within 5 squares of you and teleport it 5 squares.
You cannot teleport a conjuration larger than 1 square or a summoned creature that size Large or larger.

feat.title: Arcane Reserves
feat.benefit: If all your arcane encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your arcane at-will attack powers until the end of your encounter or until you regain the use of one or more of your arcane encounter attack powers.
This bonus increases to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Arcane Ritualist
feat.benefit: Choose one ritual that you know.
Change the key skill of that ritual to Arcana and you gain a +2 bonus to skill checks as part of that ritual.
Each time you learn a new ritual, you can change the ritual affected by this feat to the newly learned ritual.
feat.special: You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you select this feat, choose a different ritual.

feat.title: Arcane Vampire
feat.benefit: Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with an arcane encounter attack, you gain a healing surge.

As a nonaction interrupt before rolling damage for an arcane encounter attack power, you can lose a healing surge to gain a bonus to the triggering power's damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
This bonus damage increases to 3 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and 6 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bael Turath Ancestry
feat.benefit: Your racial fire resistance increases to 5 + your level.

feat.title: Balican High Praetor
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy under your warlock's curse drops to 0 hit points, you gain the following benefit in addition to regaining your fell might:

► The next ally you can see that hits with a damaging attack before the start of your next turn subjects its target to your curse. If the target is already under your curse, the ally's attack instead deals extra damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
This extra damage increases to 5 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 7 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

You can enhance powers associated with this feat with your fell might. When you hit an enemy with such a power, each ally adjacent to the target can either shift 1 square as a free reaction or gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Balican Praetor
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Diplomacy checks.

When you enhance your hand of blight, you can forgo the extra damage the enhancement would deal to instead grant the target vulnerability to all damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the start of your next turn.
Each time the target takes damage while it has this vulnerability, reduce the vulnerability by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

feat.title: Beseech Patron
feat.benefit: You can use your Pact Boon with the following trigger in addition to its normal trigger:
Trigger: You spen an action point to gain an extra action and use an arcane daily power with the action

feat.title: Beshaba's Boon
feat.benefit: Each time an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect you imposed, you gain 5 temporary hit points.
These temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bitter Cold
feat.benefit: When you hit a creature with a Cold power from any class that allows you to qualify for this feat, that creature takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude defense until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Black Vistani Cat
feat.benefit: Your evil eye of the Vistani can originate from your active cat familiar.
Using evil eye of the Vistani in this way does not provoke opportunity attacks.

feat.title: Bleak Guide's Return
feat.benefit: Whenever you score a critical hit with your eyes of the vestige power, the next Warlock encounter attack you use before the end of your next turn is not expended if you miss every target.

feat.title: Blood Pact of Cania
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with gift of Avernus, hellish rebuke, and any Warlock power that has additional benefits for Infernal Pact.
The bonus damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bloodied Boon
feat.benefit: You can choose to gain your Pact Boon when an enemy under your curse is first bloodied. If you do so, your curse is removed from that enemy.

feat.title: Bonded Familiar
feat.benefit: You and your familiar can communicate telepathically out to a range of 10 squares. You must have line of sight and line of effect to your familiar to communicate with it in this manner.
At 11th level, you can communicate out to a range of 50 squares. You can communicate out to a range of 10 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect.

At 21st level, you can communicate out to a range of 1 mile. You can communicate out to a range of 50 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect, and to a range of 10 squares even if you have neither.

feat.title: Bow Caster
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency in bows as an implement.

feat.title: Brutal Curse
feat.benefit: When you roll your additional curse damage, reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher.

feat.title: Burn Everything
feat.benefit: Your arcane Fire powers ignore an amount of fire resistance. The amount equals one-half the ability modifier of the ability you use to make the attack.
The amount you ignore increases by 5 at 11th level, and by 10 at 21st level.
In addition, you treat a creature that is immune to fire as instead having resist fire equal to 15 + one-half its level.

feat.title: Champion of Raam
feat.benefit: In addition to regaining the use of your fell might, whenever you drop an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points or less, you can shift a number of squares equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.

You can also expend your fell might to augment any power associated with this feat. When you hit an enemy with an augmented such power, the target cannot include you as a target in its attacks until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Cloying Darkness of Maladomini
feat.benefit: When an enemy hits you with a melee attack while you have concealment granted by your Shadow Walk, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Consuming the Weak

prereq.name: a deity with either the Destruction or Fire domain

feat.benefit: Whenever you hit a target vulnerable to or another weakness to fire with a Fire attack power from a qualifying class, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends) in addition to the attack's normal effects. If the attack already causes ongoing fire damage, increase it by 5 instead.
This ongoing damage increases to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Crimson Fire
feat.benefit: Against a creature under your Divine Sanction, you use d10s for your curse damage.

feat.title: Crimson Legionnaire
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with Paladin powers against creatures under your curse.
This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Critical Curse
feat.benefit: If you score a critical hit with a Warlock power, you can apply your Warlock's Curse dice as critical dice. You can do this even if the target is not cursed by you or you have already used your curse this turn.
This does not allow you to deal your Warlock's Curse damage twice to the same target on the same attack.
On the same turn that you score a critical hit, you can curse that target even if it is not the enemy closest to you.

feat.title: Cruel Whimsy
feat.benefit: When an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect bestowed by one of your arcane powers, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Cull the Weak
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against a bloodied or weakened enemy, you gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls against that enemy.
This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Curse of Displacement
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit against a creature under your curse, you can teleport it 3 squares as a free reaction.

feat.title: Curse of Doom Ensured
feat.benefit: When you hit or miss an enemy under your curse, that enemy grants combat advantage for the first attack one of your allies makes against it. The attack must come before the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Curse of Io's Blood
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, your Warlock's Curse deals additional damage equal to your Strength modifier.
This additional damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Curse of the Blind Stars
feat.benefit: When you hit a foe under your curse with a Radiant encounter or daily Warlock attack, you can forgo dealing your curse damage to instead cause the target to become blinded until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Cursed Advantage
feat.benefit: You gain combat advantage against bloodied enemies under your curse.

feat.title: Cursed Shadow
feat.benefit: On your turn, when you have concealment from the Shadow Walk feature, you are insubstantial.
Also, you can use shadow step without meeting the requirement, but must end the teleportation adjacent to a creature under your curse.

feat.title: Cursed Spells
feat.benefit: Your curse damage increases by an ability modifier depending on your pact:
Dark Pact: Dexterity modifier.
Fey Pact: Dexterity modifier.
Infernal Pact: Constitution modifier.
Star Pact: Intelligence modifier.
Vestige Pact: Intelligence modifier.
Sorcerer-King Pact: Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Dark Thaumaturgy
feat.benefit: Each time you complete an encounter without using your Action Point, you gain a +2 cumulative bonus to all skill checks related to performing a ritual.

feat.title: Darkfire Implement
feat.benefit: When you hit a target with your darkfire racial power and are wielding an implement you are proficient with, the target takes damage equal to twice your implement's enhancement bonus.
This damage increases to 2 + twice your implement's enhancement bonus at 11th level, and to 4 + twice your implement's enhancement bonus at 21st level.

feat.title: Darkfire Reaper
feat.benefit: When you reduce the target of your darkfire racial power to 0 hit points or less with a melee or ranged attack, you regain the use of darkfire.

feat.title: Daughter's Promises
feat.benefit: Your dark one's blessing class power changes from personal to special, and you replace the effect with the following:
Effect: Each enemy within 1 square of the triggering enemy takes fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level, and you gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level.

feat.title: Death Curse
feat.benefit: When you deal the additional necrotic damage from your dark reaping to a target under your curse, all other creatures under your curse take necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
This damage increases to 2 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Demonweb Spiral
feat.benefit: Any creature damaged by your dark spiral release attack is also immobilized until the start of its next turn, or until the end of its next turn if you weakened it.

feat.title: Destructive Arcana
feat.benefit: When you use an arcane attack power and hit at least two creatures or target at least four creatures, you gain a +2 bonus to the power's damage roll.
This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Destructive Power
feat.benefit: You can exchange any 6th-level or higher utility power you know for destructive power.

power.title: Destructive Power
power.fluff: By funneling greater power into your attack, you ensure its effect is not wasted

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll a 1 on any damage die when you hit with an area or close attack, or a daily attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll any result of 1 on a d4 or d6 damage die until the die roll is something other than 1, or reroll any result of 1 or 2 on another damage die until the die roll is something other than 1 or 2.

feat.title: Devil's Favor
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you can choose to not regain hit points to instead gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and damage rolls until the end of your next turn.
The bonus to damage increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Diminishing Spirit Curse
feat.benefit: When you hit a bloodied enemy that is under your curse, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Dooming Action
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action and deal your curse damage as part of that action, it does not count towards your normal limit of dealing curse damage only once per turn.

feat.title: Draconic Arcanist
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls with arcane powers that have the same damage keyword as your dragon breath racial power.
Even if your dragon breath can deal different types of damage, this feat's benefits only applies to the original damage type you chose at character creation.
The bonus to damage rolls increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Draji Aspirant
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.

Once per encounter when you enhance your hand of blight attack power, you can forgo the extra damage and instead cause the target to shift its speed away from you as a free reaction. It does so using the safest, fastest path.

feat.title: Draji Devotee
feat.benefit: You gain the following three benefits:
► In addition to regaining the use of your Fell Might, whenever an enemy under your curse drops to 0 hit points or less, you can push each enemy adjacent to you 1 square.

► Also, you can expend your Fell Might to augment any power associated with this feat. When you do, each enemy adjacent to the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The augmented power gains the Fear keyword if it doesn't already have it.
► In addition, you count as having the Star Pact for the purposes of determining the effects of the powers associated with this feat.

feat.title: Dual Implement Arcanist
feat.benefit: When you use an arcane attack power and you are wielding a magic implement in each hand, you can add the off-hand implement's enhancement bonus as an item bonus to the power's damage rolls.
Both your implements must be usable with the power, and you must have proficiency with both implements, to gain this benefit.

feat.title: Eldritch Fire
feat.benefit: When you use your eldritch blast or eldritch strike class power, you can choose for it to deal fire damage. If you do, it gains the Fire keyword and gains a +1 bonus to the damage roll.
The bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Eldritch Momentum
feat.benefit: If you move at least 3 squares away from where you started your turn, until the start of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against creatures under your curse.

feat.title: Elemental Echo
feat.benefit: When you use the racial power granted by your Elemental Manifestation racial trait, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with arcane powers until the end of your next turn.
This bonus to damage increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Elemental Empowerment
feat.benefit: When you use an at-will power from the class you used to qualify for this feat and that has the Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder keyword, you add one-half your Strength modifier to the damage roll as a feat bonus.

When you use an encounter power or daily power from the class you used to qualify for this feat and that has the Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder keyword, you add your Strength modifier to the damage roll as a feat bonus.

feat.title: Elusive Hexer
feat.benefit: When an enemy takes damage from your Warlock's Curse on your turn, you become invisible until the end of your current turn.

feat.title: Elven Arcane Precision
feat.benefit: When you use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll an attack roll for an arcane attack, you can reroll all attack rolls for that power that you wish.

feat.title: Empowering Shadows
feat.benefit: When you have concealment from your Shadow Walk class feature, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with Warlock attacks.
This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Eochaid's Lure
feat.benefit: When you leave a square because of your misty step Pact Boon power, you can slide each enemy adjacent to that square 1 square.

feat.title: Ephemeral Stride
feat.benefit: While you have concealment from your Shadow Walk class feature, you are treated as insubstantial against attacks triggered by your movement and can enter your enemies' spaces, though you cannot end your move there and trigger opportunity attacks normally for entering an enemy's space.

feat.title: Explosive Spellcasting
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit with an arcane area or close attack power and you are wielding an implement that deals extra damage on a critical hit, you can choose to deal that extra damage against any single target that you hit with the attack.
If you score more than one critical hit, you can choose to deal the extra damage to the same target.

feat.title: Exultant Shadow Step
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit against a creature under your curse, you can teleport 3 squares as a free reaction. If you score more than one critical hit with one attack, you can only teleport once.
The distance you can teleport increases to 4 squares at 11th level, and to 5 squares to 21st level.

feat.title: Fanged Magic
feat.benefit: While under the effects of your longtooth shifting racial power, each time you hit with a ranged arcane attack power, one enemy adjacent to the target takes damage equal to 2 + your implement's enhancement bonus.
This damage increases to 3 + your implement's enhancement bonus at 11th level, and to 5 + your implement's enhancement bonus at 21st level.

feat.title: Favored of Raam
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Streetwise checks.
Also, when you augment your hand of blight class power, you can choose to forgo the extra damage from the augment to instead become invisible to the target after the attack has been resolved.

feat.title: Fey Revel Glamor
feat.benefit: Whenever you deal your curse damage to a target using a Warlock daily power, the target is slowed (save ends).
If the attack already applies a slowing effect that a save ends to the target, it is instead immobilized (save ends).

feat.title: Filching Shadows
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit an enemy under your curse with an encounter or daily warlock power, you can choose to reduce your curse damage to teleport the target.
If you do, after the attack has been resolved, you can teleport the target 3 squares for each die you reduced your curse damage by, to a minimum of 0 dice.

feat.title: Frost Step
feat.benefit: When you use your misty step class power, the space you teleport from and all squares adjacent to that space become difficult terrain to everyone but you or creatures with Icewalk. This difficult terrain lasts until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Gifted Death Dealer
feat.benefit: Your eldritch strike class power deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

feat.title: Glasya's Rebuke
feat.benefit: Each time a target takes damage from your hellish rebuke class power because you took damage, one enemy within 5 squares of the target also takes 3 fire damage.
This fire damage increases to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Golden Lion of Urik
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy under your warlock's curse drops to 0 hit points, you gain the following benefit in addition to regaining your fell might:
► Each enemy cursed by you must choose to either drop prone or become weakened until the start of your next turn.

Also, you can expend your Fell Might to enhance any power associated with this feat. When you hit with such a power, one ally within 5 squares of you makes a basic attack as a free reaction. His or her attack deals additional thunder damage equal to your Intelligence modifier and gains the Thunder keyword.
This additional thunder damage increases to 3 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Hell's Chosen
feat.benefit: When you deal deal your Warlock's Curse damage, you can choose for that damage to be fire damage.
Also, if you have the eldritch blast or eldritch strike attack power, you can choose for it to deal fire damage and gain the Fire keyword. You can make this choice each time you use the power.

feat.title: Hellbound Heart
feat.benefit: Whenever you spend a healing surge, you resist fire equal to 5 + one-half your level and a +2 bonus to your first saving throw before the end of your next turn.
If you already have resist fire, you can instead increase that resistance by 5 instead of gaining this resistance.

feat.title: Hellfire Arcanist
feat.benefit: When you push, pull, or slide a creature with a Fear power, increase that forced movement by 2 squares.
Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with Fire attacks.
This bonus to damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Hellfire Hex
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit a target under your curse with a Warlock daily attack power, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends), or ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends) if the power has the Fire keyword.
The ongoing damage increases to 10 or 15, respectively, at 21st level.
If the power already deals ongoing fire damage, you can choose to instead give the target a penalty to its first save against the ongoing damage. The penalty equals your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Improved Dark One's Blessing
feat.benefit: Your dark one's blessing grants you 3 additional temporary hit points.
These additional temporary hit points increase to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Improved Dark Spiral Release
feat.benefit: You roll d8s instead of 1d6s for the damage of the Dark Spiral Release action of your dark spiral class power.
Starting at 11th level, you roll d10s instead of d8s.

feat.title: Improved Fate of the Void
feat.benefit: You gain an additional +1 bonus to the roll on which you use the bonus from your fate of the void class power.

feat.title: Improved Misty Step
feat.benefit: Your misty step class power allows you to teleport an additional 2 squares.

feat.title: Inevitable Doom
feat.benefit: If you miss an enemy cursed by you with an attack and deal no damage to it, you gain a +1d6 bonus to your next damage roll against it made before the end of the encounter. Each time you miss the target with an attack and deal no damage, increase the damage by one die.
If your curse deals a different die of damage, this additional damage uses the same die.

feat.title: Spreading Curse
feat.benefit: When an enemy cursed by you drops to 0 hit points or less, you can place your curse on all enemies adjacent to the dying enemy as a free reaction.

feat.title: Wrathful Magic
feat.benefit: You can use your infernal wrath racial power with the following trigger instead of the usual one:
Trigger: You miss a creature within 10 squares with an arcane attack power

feat.title: Yellow Cloak of Urik
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to History checks.
Also, when you augment your hand of blight class power with your Fell Might, you can forgo dealing the extra damage to instead immobilize the target until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Yorgrix's Brutality
feat.benefit: When you damage a creature with a Warlock attack power while that creature is taking ongoing damage, the attack deals 2 extra poison damage.
This extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level, and to 6 at 21st level.
